string.text: Slower earlier but faster later levels, level 62 total: 40.7m [ON] vs 95.4m [OFF]. [Default: OFF] WARNING: Backup save recommended, changing this in an ongoing save will reset the level xp to half-way to the next level (if total xp is out of bounds for the current level after conversion)!
Adjust the maximum achievable character level. Higher levels require much more xp! [Default: 62]
Adjust how skill xp is converted into level xp, default is 1-to-1 at 1.00. [Default: 1.00]
Number of level ups required to gain an attribute point. Only affects future level ups, so it should be changed before starting a new campaign to take full effect! [Default: 4]
Focus point limit per skill. (UI will at most show 5 points) [Default: 5]
Apparently affects the attribute points with which NPCs start, but not the player. [Default: 15]
Apparently affects the focus points with which NPCs start, but not the player. [Default: 5]
Learning Limit Increase per Attribute Point
E.g. at 3 and with 10 AP an additional 30 skill points can be gained at reducing learning rate; at 5 an additional 50 can be gained. [Default: 3]
Learning Limit Increase per Focus Point
Adjust the learning limit increase per focus point. [Default: 50]
Set a maximum learning rate, zero disables it. [Default: 0.00]
Adjust the overall skill learning rate. [Default: 1.00]
Overrides 'Skill XP Modifier' for NPCs, when not 0. [Default: 0.00]
Overrides 'Skill XP Modifier' and 'NPC Skill XP Modifier' for clan members or companions, when not 0. [Default: 0.00]
Clan modifiers only affect Companions. [Default: OFF]
Overrides 'Skill XP Modifier' and 'NPC Skill XP Modifier' for this specific skill, when not 0. [Default: 0.00]
Overrides modifiers for this specific skill for NPCs only, when not 0. [Default: 0.00]
Overrides modifiers for this specific skill for clan members or companions only, when not 0. [Default: 0.00]
Adjust smithing part research gain rate for smithing and smelting weapons. [Default: 100%]
Adjust smithing part research gain rate when in free build mode. With the default setting, unlocking parts is slow in free build mode. [Default: 10%]
